name: My Beauty Spa: Stars & Stories
description:
My Beauty Spa is a unique blend of intriguing Hollywood stories, city building and farming !
Build your perfect Beauty Spa! Harvest crops, process them at your facilities, and create amazing eco-friendly treatments. Trade with other Spas. Open hair and make-up salons, massage studios and other treatment services to provide a perfect experience to your Hollywood customers. Explore the Hollywood boulevard and find rare resources. Run your own production and get involved in the Hollywood gossip and stories.
Are you ready to build your dream beauty spa? Let’s get started!

My Beauty Spa features:
● FUN and exciting storylines to follow and explore
● PROVIDE and build classy beauty and spa services to your customers
● UNLOCK fun, charismatic beauty-experts with orders you need to fill
● GROW ingredients and create eco-friendly treatments
● FASHION and Beauty events to participate in and win great prizes
● SPA Managers help you out with production and treatments
● Play with your friends or make new friends in the game community!

My Beauty Spa is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.
*You need an internet connection to play the game and enable social interaction, competitions, and other features.*
Got questions? Check out our community: https://www.facebook.com/mybeautyspagame
Got feedback? We’re always happy to hear it: hello@cherrypickgames.com

Privacy Policy: http://www.cherrypickgames.com/privacypolicy/
Terms of Service: http://cherrypickgames.com/termsofservices/
